priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C125745

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version Test Code Terminology

definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version test code.
name: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Is [name] able to communicate with you in a way that you and others clearly understand?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Able to Communicate Clearly

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - How do they communicate primarily?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - How They Communicate Primarily

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Is [name] able to give the correct date and time within a few seconds of being asked?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Give Correct Date and Time When Asked

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] have only a few words that [s/he] uses over and over or does [s/he] express him/herself only through random answers, shouting or swearing?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Use Few Words or Random Shouting

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] only moan, groan or make other sounds that are not understandable?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Make Sounds Not Understandable

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Can [name] feed him/herself independently or manage tube feedings appropriately without help or reminders?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Feed Independently Without Help

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] understand what eating or feeding utensils or equipment are for and how they should be used?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Understand Feeding Utensils

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] know when meal or feeding times are?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Know Meal Times

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Can [name] use the toilet or manage their bowel and bladder routine independently and appropriately without help or reminders?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Use Toilet Independently

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] understand how to manage their clothing or special equipment when toileting or in bowel and bladder management?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Manage Clothing When Toileting

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] know when to use the toilet or to conduct bowel and bladder management?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Know When to Use Toilet

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Can [name] dress and groom him/herself independently and appropriately or direct someone else in these activities without help or reminders?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Can Dress and Groom Self Independently

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [s/he] know how to bathe and wash?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Know How to Bathe and Wash

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [s/he] understand how to get dressed?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Understand How to Get Dressed

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Can [s/he] start and finish these grooming activities without prompting?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Start and Finish Grooming Activities

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] function completely independently? That is, [s/he] does not require any physical assistance, supervision, equipment, devices or reminders for cognitive, social, behavioral, emotional, and physical function?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Function Completely Independently

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] REQUIRE special aids or equipment such as a brace, walker, wheelchair, memory notebook, day planner, verbal reminders, prompts, cues, or alarm watch because of a disability?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Require Special Aids or Equipment

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [name] require physical assistance from another person to meet daily needs?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Require Physical Assistance

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [s/he] require assistance from another person in tasks that require thinking abilities?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Require Assistance Thinking Tasks

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [s/he] require assistance from another person to manage emotions and behavior?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Require Assistance Managing Emotions

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [s/he] take care of some of their needs but also need a helper who is always close by?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Need a Helper Always Close By
synonyms: ED1-Need a Helper Always Close By

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [s/he] need help with all major activities and the assistance of another person all the time?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Need Help With All Major Activities
synonyms: ED1-Need Help With All Major Activities

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Does [s/he] need 24-hour care and is not able to help with their own care at all?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Need 24-Hour Care

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Can [name] function with complete independence in work or social situations?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Function With Independent Work or Social Situations

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Can [name] understand, remember, and follow directions?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Understand and Follow Directions

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - Can [name] keep track of time, schedules and appointments?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Keep Track of Time

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - How certain are you that [name] can perform in a wide variety of jobs of [his/her] choosing or manage a home independently or participate in school full-time?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Perform Jobs or Manage a Home Independently

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - How certain are you that [name] can be successful at work, school or in home management with some reduction in the work load or with other accommodations due to disabilities?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Successful With Accommodations

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - How certain are you that [name] can be successful at work, school or in home management but with limited choices in jobs or school courses due to disabilities?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Successful With Limited Choices

terms.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Caregiver Version - How certain are you that [name] can be able to work at home or in a special setting like a sheltered workshop in which the work is very routine and there is very frequent supervision and support?
terms.preferredTerm: Expanded DRS-PI Caregiver Version - Work With Frequent Supervision and Support
